actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.
Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs discharged in House.

actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Rereferred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to provide for the return to the former owners of certain formal tribal lands acquired in connection with the Garrison Dam Reservoir project.

summary.text: Provides that approximately 418 acres, needed by the Three Affiliated Tribes of the Fort Berthold Reservation, North Dakota, and not needed for the purposes of the Garrison Dam project, are hereby restored to the tribal ownership of the Three Affiliated Tribes. Authorizes appropriations to carry out this Act.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the return to the former owners of certain formal tribal lands acquired in connection with the Garrison Dam Reservoir project.
